message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a special starting price of $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you, and this is a competitive offer considering its potential.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $12,000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. This is a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, I understand your position, but $8,500 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $11,000. This is my final offer.
